dialog.description:
The local branch of the Hudson Franklin Bank is under attack. Our hacker is using four attack towers located around the city in an attempt to gain access to financial records.
Take out the attacking towers by selecting them and then correctly answering the questions. All four towers must be taken offline before the bank's defenses are depleted.
Good Luck!
(Click to Begin)
dialog.levelSuccess:
Congratulations, you have successfully protected the bank's records.
Unfortunately, the hacker was able to escape before being apprehended, and we believe he is already planning another attack.
There is no time for celebration. We must locate and stop the hacker from striking again.
(Click to Continue)
dialog.levelFailure:
You have failed to protect the bank's records.
The hacker penetrated the network and stole the personal information of thousands of customers. The bank appreciates your efforts, but it is now forced to reimburse customers for their losses and make costly improvements to its network defenses.
There is no time to rest. You should improve your skills and prepare yourself to try to stop the hacker once again.
(Click to Replay)
